README: >> This file contains all scripting and dialogue for GM2Godot, including the main executable in internal modules.
>> When translating into other languages, DO NOT change the name of any of the keys, only the string they're associated with.
>> Additionally, DO NOT modify any strings surrounded by {brackets}. These are used to the program to format non-string objects (such as varaiables) into a string.
>> Changing either of these will cause a crash.
Language and Language_Code are read by GM2Godot to list the file as a language option.
README, Language, Author, Version, are not used by GM2Godot, they are simply a means of documentation and attribution.
Author: written by Infiland, structured by HalfofBilly
Console_Error_InvalidProject: No {file_extension} file found in the selected {file_name} project folder.
Console_Error_MultipleGenericFiles: Multiple {file_extension} files found: {files}. Please ensure only one {file_extension} file is present.
Console_Error_MissingDirectories: Please select both GameMaker and Godot project paths.
Console_Error_MissingGamemakerFile: Error: No .yyp file found in the GameMaker project folder.
Console_Error_MultipleGamemakerFiles: Warning: Multiple .yyp files found: {yyp_files}. Using the first one.
Console_Error_MissingGodotFile: Error: No project.godot file found in the Godot project folder.
Console_ConversionComplete_B: You have ported your project from GameMaker to Godot! Have fun!
Console_Convertor_Icon_Error_FileNotFoun: No icon file found in the GameMaker project's icon directory.
Console_Convertor_Settings_Error_yypNotF: No .yyp file found in the GameMaker project folder.
Console_Convertor_Settings_Error_yypName: Error reading project name from .yyp file: {error}
Console_Convertor_Settings_Error_GD_NotF: project.godot file not found in the Godot project directory.
Console_Convertor_Settings_Error_Name_GM: Could not update project name: GameMaker project name not found.
Console_Convertor_AudioBus_Error_Section: AudioGroups section not found in the .yyp file.
Console_Convertor_AudioBus_Error_NameNot: No AudioGroup names found in the .yyp file.
Console_Convertor_Sprites_Error_NotFound: No sprite images found in the GameMaker project.
Console_Convertor_Sounds_Error_NotFound: No sound files found in the GameMaker project.
Console_Convertor_Notes_Error_NotFound: No notes folder found in GameMaker project.
Icon_Error_Photoimage: Failed to set icon using PhotoImage: {error}
Icon_Error_Linux: Failed to set icon on Linux: {error}
Icon_Error_Path: Failed to load icon from {icon_path}. The icon will not be displayed.
ReleaseNotes_Error_NoInternet: Unable to fetch release notes. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Settings_Platform_Subheading: Choose which Gamemaker platform settings to convert to Godot
